translation.zh: ‎你不能担心你们是否喜欢你

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, I...
Shit.
I get that with my employees,
but we're talking about my oldest friends.
translation.zh: ‎但我们说的是我交情最久的朋友

translation.en: I mean, of course I'm gonna be worried about what they think.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 我当然会担心她们的想法

translation.en: -That's where you're fucking up. -Why?
Because I don't think your friends even invited you on this trip.
translation.zh:
‎因为我认为你的朋友们
‎根本没邀请你参加这次旅行

translation.en: Did Abby tell you that?
Did she say five people were coming?
What? No.
Well, I'm saying work is a big part of who you are.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 工作是你很重要的一部分

translation.en: So if they don't let you talk about work,
translation.zh: ‎所以如果她们不让你谈论工作

translation.en: then they're not letting you be on this trip.
translation.zh: ‎她们就不可能让你参加这次旅行

translation.en: Yeah, okay. Can I just say something?
translation.zh: ‎嗯 好 我能说点什么吗？

translation.en: No. Remember what I said?
About the phrase "Can I just say something?"
translation.zh: ‎关于“我能说点什么吗？”这句话？

translation.en: -Just walk away from that phrase. -Fuck, right.
When I was a kid,
I was always alone, you know?
My mom was a single, working mother, that whole deal, right?
translation.zh:
‎我妈是个单身职业女性
‎就是这么回事 对吗？

translation.en: And it really wasn't until I met these girls that I...
translation.zh: ‎遇到这些女人之前 我没有真正

translation.en: experienced family.
That's powerful.
Friendship is powerful.
You gotta do that show.
Stay busy, pizza for one. Be honest with yourself,
translation.zh: ‎保持忙碌 忙披萨的事 对自己坦诚

translation.en: work is your best friend. And you gotta get contestants on that show
translation.zh:
‎工作是你最好的朋友
‎你的在节目中找竞争者

translation.en: that are kids, because I love watching kids with knives.
translation.zh:
‎也就是孩子
‎因为我喜欢看拿刀的孩子

translation.en: Yeah.
This weekend is a mess.
I can't even plan a fun birthday trip.
translation.zh: ‎我甚至不能策划一次有趣的生日旅行

translation.en: Can I quote one of my favorite song lyrics?
translation.zh:
‎我能引用我最爱歌曲中的
‎一句歌词吗？

translation.en: "Self-doubt is self-worth
in another universe."
What song is that?
My own.
Of course.
Is the paella ready yet?
Just about, maybe another four hours or so.
Oh, Jesus.
-How are you gonna get that thing home? -I don't know. I'll fucking fold it.
translation.zh:
‎-那玩意怎么带回家？
‎-不知道 我会叠起来

translation.en: You know what?
Today was not an amazing day in wine country.
So, suck on that.
-So how is it? Are you having fun? -This trip is three nights too long.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么样？你玩得开心吗？
‎-这次旅行有三晚 太长了

translation.en: But the trip is only three nights. Oh. I get it.
translation.zh: ‎但旅行只有三晚 我懂了

translation.en: I wish I was there.
Hello, this is Olivia from Dr. Melton's office
translation.zh:
‎喂 我是莫尔顿医生办公室的
‎奥莉薇雅

translation.en: calling to let you know that the results from your blood work are in.
translation.zh:
‎我打来是想告诉你
‎你的血液检查结果出来了

translation.en: If you could please give us a call back at your earliest convenience...
Fuck!
Oh, my God.
Oh, my back!
My back!
Oh, no.
Oh, my God, no.
Guys!
Hey.
So, quick update, the paella is still simmering.
translation.zh:
‎快速说一下最新消息
‎西班牙海鲜烩饭还在炖

translation.en: It's gonna take a little longer than I thought.
translation.zh: ‎比我想象的要多花一点时间

translation.en: Whatever, Devon.
Any chance we could have sex?
Fine.
Good morning, sunshine.
I'd love to stick around and snuggle, but the paella is probably peaking.
translation.zh:
‎我想留下来跟你相依相偎
‎但西班牙海鲜烩饭可能快煮好了

translation.en: Devon, get the fuck out.
To be continued.
Rebecca?
What's going on? Are you okay? Did you pass out?
translation.zh: ‎怎么回事？你没事吧？你晕倒了吗？

translation.en: No, I'm not okay.
-I threw my back out. -Oh, no.
-Okay, let me call Tammy. -No, Naomi, shut up, shut it.
translation.zh:
‎-好 我给谭美打电话
‎-不 娜欧蜜 闭嘴

translation.en: -Okay. -Just help me up here.
You got it.
-Okay, just get me up. -Okay, you got it.
translation.zh:
‎-好 把我扶起来
‎-好 没问题

translation.en: -Okay, ready? One, two, three... -No problem.
translation.zh:
‎-好 准备好了吗？一、二、三…
‎-没问题

translation.en: Oh, honey.
Are you okay?
I was lying here all night.
And I realized...
Abby was right about me.
I did need to take a good hard look in the mirror,
translation.zh: ‎我的确需要好好审视镜中的自己

translation.en: or in this case, the door.
And as I was lying here,
I saw every truth about myself.
translation.zh: ‎我看到关于自己的所有真相

translation.en: Soon,
a trio of raccoons joined me.
Right there.
Yeah.
I locked eyes with the dad.
Once you've looked in the eye of a raccoon,
you know your truth.
How did you know he was the dad?
He was just the leader, I could tell.
But you didn't, like, look at--
They were all with me, though. They stayed here. It was amazing.
translation.zh:
‎它们都跟我在一起
‎它们留在这里 很神奇

translation.en: -You saw a family of raccoons? -Yes.
And you communicated with them?
I connected with them more than anyone this whole weekend.
translation.zh:
‎我跟它们之间的交流
‎多过这个周末跟其他任何人的交流

translation.en: Honey, did you take that molly?
They helped me see what I really am.
translation.zh: ‎它们帮助我看清楚了自己的真实面目

translation.en: -An old lady. -What?
Yes, it's true. I'm old, 50!
-That's half a fucking century. -Listen...
we are all getting older, and... maybe our bodies aren't working--
translation.zh:
‎我们都会变老 而且…
‎我们的身体不会正常运作…

translation.en: Fuck feedback. I don't want any feedback right now.
translation.zh: ‎不要反馈 我现在不想要任何反馈

translation.en: -Okay. -I need to make some big changes.
Number one...
I'm in a shitty marriage.
Brian is a world-class ding-dong.
Thank God.
Brian sucks.
Hey, what's going on in here?
Rebecca threw her back out, and Brian sucks.
translation.zh: ‎瑞贝卡扭伤她的背了 布莱恩逊毙了

translation.en: What? No.
Val, she knows.
-Thank God. -Yeah, we don't like him.
-Such an asshole. -I'm done lying to myself.
translation.zh:
‎-对 我们不喜欢他
‎-是个大混蛋 ‎我不想骗自己了

translation.en: I'm ready to tell it like it is.
It's just like Lady Sunshine said.
It is later than we think, so--
translation.zh: ‎事情比我们想象的要晚 所以…

translation.en: Okay. Get me up off this floor.
translation.zh: ‎好 帮我从地板上抬起来

translation.en: 'Cause we are gonna do everything on that goddamn itinerary,
translation.zh:
‎因为那个该死的日程安排上的每件事
‎我们都要做

translation.en: and we are gonna do it now!
This is really good news, 'cause I have planned exciting things.
translation.zh:
‎真是个好消息
‎因为我计划了一些很刺激的事情

translation.en: Where's Catherine? Has anyone seen her this morning?
translation.zh: ‎凯瑟琳在呢？今早有人见过她吗？

translation.en: Oh, my God, did she leave early to do that stupid-ass cooking show?
translation.zh:
‎天哪 她提前离开
‎去拍那个愚蠢的饮食节目了吗？

translation.en: Unbelievable, she full-on bailed on Rebecca's birthday.
translation.zh: ‎不可思议 她不参加瑞贝卡的生日

translation.en: -Oh, happy birthday by the way. -Happy birthday!
translation.zh:
‎-对了 生日快乐
‎-生日快乐！

translation.en: Load me up!
-Okay. -Let's go!
-You all right? -Go! Move!
-Okay, don't-- -Get me out of this bathrobe, though.
translation.zh:
‎-好 不要…
‎-帮我把这件浴袍脱了

translation.en: It's really depressing. Put me in my finest muumuu!
translation.zh: ‎真令人抑郁 ‎帮我穿上我最漂亮的穆穆袍！

translation.en: Hey! Good news.
Two hours and counting on the paella.
translation.zh: ‎西班牙海鲜烩饭两小时后会好

translation.en: How in God's name is that paella not ready?
translation.zh: ‎西班牙海鲜烩饭怎么还没好？

translation.en: I got a little sidetracked last night.
-Stop. -Okay, you know what? It's fine.
translation.zh: ‎别说了 ‎好 知道吗？没关系

translation.en: -We don't even want the paella. -No, I can't wait to taste it, Devon.
translation.zh: ‎我们根本不想吃西班牙海鲜烩饭 ‎不 我真想马上尝尝 德文

translation.en: No, let's not bullshit him. We don't want the paella.
translation.zh:
‎不 别忽悠他了
‎我们不想吃西班牙海鲜烩饭

translation.en: Life is too short to wait for the paella!
translation.zh:
‎生命太短暂
‎不能等西班牙海鲜烩饭！

translation.en: Ladies, we are gonna grab this day by the motherfucking balls.
translation.zh: ‎姐妹们 我们要好好过今天

translation.en: I'm gonna get this wheely chair onto this senior van,
translation.zh: ‎我要把这辆轮椅抬上这辆破旧的车

translation.en: -and I'm going to my birthday brunch! -Yeah! All right, let's do it!
translation.zh:
‎-我要去吃我的生日早午餐！
‎-好耶！好 去吧！

translation.en: Let's move it! Yeah!
I feel every bump.
-Oh, okay, sorry. -Okay, no, it's all right.
translation.zh:
‎-好 抱歉
‎-好 不 没关系

translation.en: My work here is done.
Okay, are you ready?
-Lay it on me. Big five-oh. -Okay, here we go.
-Keep your eyes closed. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-眼睛不要睁开
‎-好 ‎（安东尼奥披萨店）

translation.en: Happy, happy birthday It's your special day
translation.zh: ‎快乐 生日快乐 ‎今天是你的特别之日

translation.en: Have a slice of pizza What's your favorite way? Hey!
translation.zh: ‎吃一块披萨 ‎你最喜欢什么口味？嘿！

translation.en: This is like end of A League of Their Own
where the baseball ladies show up at the hall of fame.
translation.zh: ‎这些女棒球手出现在名人堂

translation.en: So, check it out.
I just want to show you what I-- what we did. Okay.
translation.zh: ‎我只想给你看我…我们做了什么 好

translation.en: We got the original sign from Antonio's.
translation.zh:
‎我们从安东尼奥披萨店
‎拿来了最初的招牌 ‎（生日快乐 瑞贝卡）

translation.en: It says "Happy birthday, Rebecca."
translation.zh: ‎上面写着“生日快乐 瑞贝卡”

translation.en: There's pictures of us. These are the prices...
translation.zh: ‎有我们的照片 这些是价格…

translation.en: Oh, my God.
...that we had when we were waiting tables.
Here is the mural that somebody did a copy of.
But what's different about the face?
-You didn't! How did you do that? -We had Antonio's pizza flown in.
translation.zh:
‎-你没有吧！你怎么做的？
‎-我们把安东尼奥的披萨空运了过来

translation.en: -And these... -Oh, my God.
...are the original bread baskets we used. And everyone can take one of these home.
translation.zh:
‎…我们当时用的最初的面包篮
‎每个人都可以拿一个回家

translation.en: Wow. That is--
Okay, so, Antonio could not be with us 'cause he's dead.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 安东尼奥死了
‎所以没法跟我们在一起

translation.en: But we have our DJ dressed up like Antonio,
translation.zh: ‎但我们让DJ打扮成安东尼奥的样子

translation.en: and he is ready to get this party started!
translation.zh: ‎他已准备就绪 可以让派对开始了！

translation.en: Well, doesn't this look fun.
-Catherine! -Cut it!
Catherine! Hey! Catherine!
Sorry, we thought you left.
I have a shirt for you.
-Did you guys even notice that I was gone? -We tried to contact you.
translation.zh:
‎-你们注意到我离开了？
‎-我们试着跟你联络

translation.en: -The Wi-Fi here is... -The password is so long.
translation.zh:
‎-这里的无线网络…
‎-密码太长了

translation.en: I shouldn't have even come on this trip. I'm clearly not wanted.
translation.zh:
‎我不应该来参加这次旅行的
‎我显然不想来

translation.en: I mean, and Abby, can you just be honest?
translation.zh: ‎我是说 艾比 你能坦白点吗？

translation.en: Did you get a five-bedroom because I wasn't really invited?
translation.zh:
‎你租了一栋有五间卧室的房子
‎因为你们没邀请我？

translation.en: What? No. I honestly thought Jenny wouldn't show.
translation.zh: ‎什么？不是 我真的以为珍妮不会来

translation.en: -Same. -Whatever, I don't care anymore.
translation.zh:
‎-我也这么想
‎-无所谓了 我不在乎了

translation.en: Don't worry, you clearly won't notice that I'm gone.
translation.zh: ‎比担心 你们显然不会注意到我走了

translation.en: Wow.
Hey, cut it.
I thought she was clapping.
-It was a slow clap. -She's clapping sarcastically.
Wait, who's talking? I can't see. What's happening?
translation.zh: ‎等等 谁在说话？我看不见 怎么了？

translation.en: -Okay, what's going on here? -Oh, what's going on here
translation.zh:
‎-好 这是怎么回事？
‎-是这么回事

translation.en: is I threw my back out 'cause I'm old.
translation.zh: ‎我老了 所以我扭伤了背

translation.en: Oh, my God, Rebecca, you are not old.
translation.zh: ‎天哪 瑞贝卡 你根本不老

translation.en: Oh, please, just don't throw the word "vivacious" at me or I will lose it.
translation.zh:
‎拜托 被跟我说“活泼”这个词
‎否则我会生气的

translation.en: Naomi, what is with the slow clap?
translation.zh: ‎娜欧蜜 你慢慢地拍手是什么意思？

translation.en: Oh, I am just applauding
the greatest self-fulfilling prophecy of all time.
translation.zh: ‎在为有史以来最伟大自证预言鼓掌

translation.en: What are you talking about?
You always think that you're not invited or we leave you out.
translation.zh:
‎你总是认为我们没邀请你
‎或把你排除在外

translation.en: So you bury yourself in your work,
but then, you're so buried in your work that you are left out.
translation.zh:
‎不过话说回来 你忙得不亦乐乎
‎以至于你真的被排除在外了

translation.en: I'm busy, okay? I can't just take off work whenever I feel like it,
translation.zh:
‎我很忙 好吗？我不能随心所欲
‎就不工作了

translation.en: and I shouldn't have to apologize for being successful.
We are not asking you to apologize for being successful.
translation.zh: ‎我们没叫你因为成功而道歉

translation.en: I'm proud as fuck of you!
But have you ever considered that we might really need you here?
translation.zh:
‎但你曾经考虑过
‎我们或许需要你在这里吗？

translation.en: We all need all of us here.
I need to know that we're all gonna be there for each other,
translation.zh: ‎我需要知道 我们会彼此帮助 ‎因为这个团体对我来说很神圣

translation.en: because this group is sacred to me
translation.zh: ‎因为这个团体对我来说很神圣

translation.en: And if we can't get through a weekend together,
translation.zh: ‎如果我们不能共同度过一个周末

translation.en: well, then I'm completely lost.
I am going through a really hard time, and...
translation.zh: ‎我正在经历艰难时期 而且…

translation.en: I... You know what?
God, fuck it!
Fuck!
Fuck. DJ, play that fucking song!
translation.zh: ‎DJ演奏那首该死的歌曲 去死吧！

translation.en: Cut it.
What hard time?
I finally took the BRCA gene test.
translation.zh: ‎我终于做了乳腺癌易感基因测试

translation.en: And my results came back,
and I'm too afraid to call because I'm not ready to hear
translation.zh:
‎我很害怕 不敢打电话
‎因为我不想听到

translation.en: that I'm dying of breast cancer. Okay?
My God.
Why isn't anybody telling anybody shit?
Because Lady Sunshine was right.
No, she wasn't.
Maybe I should go after her.
There's a slideshow coming up that I think's gonna really lift her spirits.
translation.zh: ‎马上就会放幻灯片 ‎我觉得这真的会让她振作起来

translation.en: Abby, do you really think a slideshow is gonna make her fears go away?
translation.zh:
‎艾比 你真觉得幻灯片
‎会让她的恐惧消失吗？

translation.en: What? I don't know. Maybe.
Look, Rebecca. I'm just trying to fix this birthday
translation.zh:
‎听着 瑞贝卡
‎我只想尽量弥补这个生日

translation.en: so you can have fun, okay? Why is this so difficult?
translation.zh:
‎让你过得开心点 好吗？
‎为何如此艰难？

translation.en: All right, Abby, let's get real here, okay?
translation.zh: ‎好 艾比 现实点 好吗？

translation.en: You got fired, right? And this planning this birthday
translation.zh: ‎你被炒鱿鱼了 对吗？策划这次生日

translation.en: is probably the first sense of control you've had in years.
translation.zh: ‎或许是你多年来第一次有掌控感

translation.en: That's totally okay, but you asked me over and over
translation.zh: ‎这完全没关系 但你反复问我

translation.en: what I wanted for my birthday, but you didn't listen.
translation.zh: ‎我生日时到底想要什么 但你不听

translation.en: So let's stop pretending that this weekend is about me
translation.zh: ‎所以不要假装这个周末的重点是我

translation.en: because it's all about you.
Don't come after me.
I'm not coming after you. This is a dual storm out.
translation.zh:
‎我不是来追你的
‎这是两人怒气冲冲地冲出来

translation.en: Where are we going? Do you see them?
translation.zh: ‎我们要去哪里？看见她们了吗？

translation.en: Naomi, stop.
Leave me alone. I want to be by myself.
I wanna be by myself!
Naomi, wait, you're not dying.
translation.zh: ‎娜欧蜜 等等 你不会死

translation.en: You're gonna be fine.
Really? How do you know, Val? What are you, an oracle?
translation.zh:
‎真的？你怎么知道的 娃儿？
‎你是什么？先知吗？

translation.en: Are your eyeballs a mammogram?
You just scan me, and you know I'm gonna be fine?
translation.zh:
‎你对我进行扫描
‎就知道我会没事吗？

translation.en: I don't know, okay? I'm trying to be a nice person.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道 好吗？
‎我只想努力友善一点

translation.en: Can I ask you something? Why did you tip Lady Sunshine?
translation.zh:
‎我能问你一件事吗？
‎你给阳光夫人小费？

translation.en: She charged, like, $500 to tell all of us that we sucked.
translation.zh: ‎她收了500块 说我们所有人都很逊

translation.en: I can tip whoever the hell I want as much as I want.
translation.zh: ‎我给谁小费都可以 给多少都可以

translation.en: I'm a grown-ass woman.
Good. Go tip the whole world. See how that works for you.
translation.zh: ‎很好 去给全世界小费吧 看看会怎样

translation.en: This is a nightmare.
Then go home, Jenny.
We all know you want to.
All weekend, all these withering glances, making me feel like two cents.
translation.zh:
‎整个周末 所有这些咄咄逼人的眼神
‎让我感觉自己毫无价值

translation.en: Well, what do you want? A round of applause for most planning?
translation.zh:
‎你想怎样？你策划了大部分活动
‎需要我们鼓掌吗？

translation.en: Naomi, be a grown-up and call your doctor.
translation.zh: ‎娜欧蜜 成熟点 给你的医生打电话

translation.en: You are acting like a millennial.
How dare--
-Something bit me! -What did?
translation.zh:
‎-有东西咬了我一口？
‎-什么东西？

translation.en: Oh, my God! A snake.
What?
-Oh, my God! -No!
-Someone tell me what's happening! -Naomi got bit by a snake!
translation.zh: ‎快告诉我发生了什么事？ ‎娜欧蜜被蛇咬了！

translation.en: Oh, my God, it's like the cards.
translation.zh: ‎天哪 就想牌面上的一样

translation.en: -Old rocks, snakes. -Oh, my God, it's happening.
translation.zh:
‎-老旧的石头 蛇
‎-天哪 事情发生了

translation.en: Lady Sunshine was for real. I bet if we looked it up on the internet,
translation.zh:
‎阳光夫人是真的
‎我敢肯定 如果我们上网查询

translation.en: we'd find out that she's been dead for 50 years.
Oh, my God, my leg is seizing up! Fuck!
translation.zh: ‎天哪 我的腿动不了了！操！

translation.en: Everybody, stay really calm. We need to elevate it. We need to ice it.
translation.zh:
‎大家保持冷静 我们需要把腿抬高
‎在上面放冰块

translation.en: We need to call 911. We're gonna call 911.
We're calling 911. Fuck me, there's no signal.
translation.zh: ‎我们打给911 真该死 没信号

translation.en: -Fucking never service. -Does anyone have a hot spot?
translation.zh:
‎-从来都没信号

and if there is venom in my ankle,
